ComicInfo.Title: The Day Mac Became a Wanted Man!; 10 Ideas Whose Time Never Came; If the Simpsons Were Guests on the Jerry Springer Show; Deadiquette a Guide to Bad Manners for the Dead; Breaking the Code: Your Uncle's Magic Tricks Exposed!; Pondering the Great Questions of the Day; Cracked's Guide to TV Talk Shows; Gangster or Gangsta Do You Know the Difference?; One Summer Day in the Park; Dr. Dolittle's First Aid for Animals; The Wrong Can; Make Baseball More Like Football; One Brutally Hot Day in Bombay; Warnings for the Terminally Cool...; Suspicious Ads; Extreme Ideas for Everyday Activities; Behind the Scenes of Comic Book SFX!; Crappy Cracked Greeting Cards
